sense.def:
Z izrazom
personally
poudarimo, da izražamo svoje lastno mnenje.

seg.quote: Well, personally, I feel that this is very difficult.

sense.def:
Kadar človek nekaj naredi
personally
, tisto naredi sam in izvedbe ne prepusti drugim.

seg.quote: Since then I have undertaken all the enquiries personally.

sense.def:
Kar človeka prizadene
personally
, prizadene samo njega, drugih pa ne.

seg.quote: I wasn't referring to you personally.
It would be unjust for him to bear personally the great expenses involved.
